origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_sales_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves the sales data for a specified company, quarter, and year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the insurance company.'}, {'name': 'quarter', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The quarter for which the sales data is requested, e.g., Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the sales data is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'salesData', 'description': 'The sales data for the specified company, quarter, and year.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_sales_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'XYZ Insurance', 'quarter'是'Q3', 'year'是'2023'.
